products.name: Glow Serum
products.description: A lightweight serum that instantly illuminates and hydrates skin. Infused with vitamin C and natural botanicals for a radiant glow.
products.ingredients: Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, Plant Extracts

products.name: Vitamin C Serum
products.description: High-strength vitamin C serum with L-Ascorbic Acid powder for brightening and evening skin tone.
products.ingredients: L-Ascorbic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E

products.name: Hydrating Moisturizer
products.description: Lightweight gel-cream moisturizer that provides intense hydration without feeling heavy. Perfect for all skin types.
products.ingredients: Hyaluronic Acid, Jojoba Oil, Shea Butter, Peptides

products.name: Gentle Cleanser
products.description: Soothing gel cleanser that removes impurities without stripping skin. Infused with the brand's signature Miracle Broth.
products.ingredients: Miracle Broth, Sea Kelp, Algae Extract

products.name: Eye Cream
products.description: Luxury eye cream that reduces fine lines and dark circles. Formulated with Pitera for firmer, brighter under-eye area.

products.name: SPF 50 Sunscreen
products.description: Sheer, lightweight sunscreen with SPF 50 protection. Non-greasy formula suitable for everyday use.

products.name: Brightening Toner
products.description: Gentle toner that balances pH and brightens complexion. Alcohol-free formula safe for sensitive skin.
products.ingredients: Glycolic Acid, Botanical Extracts, Hyaluronic Acid

products.name: Hydrating Face Mask
products.description: Intensive hydrating mask infused with Miracle Broth. Use weekly for deep moisture and visible radiance.
products.ingredients: Miracle Broth, Sea Kelp, Mineral Powder

products.name: Retinol Serum
products.description: Pure retinol in squalane for anti-aging benefits. Reduces wrinkles and improves skin texture.

products.name: Ceramide Moisturizer
products.description: Rich, nourishing moisturizer with ceramides to restore skin barrier. Ideal for dry and dehydrated skin.
products.ingredients: Ceramides, Fatty Acids, Shea Butter, Peptides

products.name: Glycolic Acid Toner
products.description: Chemical exfoliant with 7% glycolic acid for smoother, brighter skin. Use 2-3 times weekly.
products.ingredients: Glycolic Acid, Amino Acids, Aloe Vera

products.name: Niacinamide Serum
products.description: 10% Niacinamide serum to reduce blemishes and balance oil production. Suitable for all skin types.
